allow: Bash(powershell.exe -File plan/powershell_wrappers/send_prompt.ps1 -Prompt "Write a hello world program in Python" -Pretty)

Bash(powershell.exe -File plan/powershell_wrappers/send_prompt.ps1 -Prompt "Create a complete Python script using Tkinter that displays a GUI window with the message ''Thanks Chase!'' in large, styled text. Include proper imports, window configuration, styling, and comments." -Temperature 0.3 -MaxTokens 2048)
Bash(git add .claude/ plan/ IMPLEMENTATION_SUMMARY.md TEST_RESULTS.md thanks_chase.py)
